name: Kicking Sequences
description: Learn the foundational and advanced kick patterns for Jumpstyle and Hardstyle dance.

cards.title: Basic Jump Kick
cards.description: A simple alternating kick executed in rhythm with the beat.
bulletpoints: Kick forward with one foot while hopping off the other
Keep your core engaged for balance
Maintain a steady pace with the beat
cards.summaryText: Alternate kicks over driving beats while core control keeps you upright.

cards.title: Cross-Kick Transition
cards.description: A more advanced variation that involves crossing the legs mid-air.
bulletpoints: Lift one leg and cross it over the other while jumping
Land softly and immediately transition into the next kick
Use ankle and knee control to avoid impact stress
cards.summaryText: Cross legs mid-air and rebound gently to chain the next kick.
